description.narrative: Inclusive Local Urban Forums (LUFs) are envisioned by the Urban Areas and Cities Act (2011) and comprise of persons with disabilities, youth,women and ethnic minorities. This project aims at enhancing the participation of persons with disabilities in governance and political processes in Narok County by activating and empowering inclusive Local Urban Forums (LUFs) in 5 urban centres ( Narok Town, OlolulungaTown, Nairagiae Nkare Town, Kilgoris Town and Mulot Town). The LUFs shall be trained in social planning and supported to develop simplified County budgets. This shall build the capacity of the LUFs to take up their citizen oversight roles and increase County Government budget and development planning processes. Devolved governments (County GovernmentAct- (2012) and Urban Areasand Cities Act - 2011) as set out in the Constitution bring government closer to the citizens with an expectation for vibrant and meaningful oversight on performance of public governance institutions. Urban forums, with their socio-economic and demographic complexities, provide fertile ground for the exercise and contestations in civic engagement.

participating-org.narrative: UDPK’s Vision is to realize a barrier free society that recognizes the rights of women, men, youth, children with disabilities, parents and caregivers. Our mission is to promote full and meaningful participation of persons with disabilities in all spheres as enshrined in legal frameworks including the Constitution, the Convention on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities and the Persons withDisabilities Act,2003. As the Umbrella organization, UDPK recognizes the efforts being made by the various state and non-state agencies in enhancing rights of persons with disabilities and those of women and girls with disabilities in particular. UDPK plays a central role and is the reference civil society organization in enhancing rights of persons with disabilities in the Kenya, recognized by government,regional and international disability organizations.

mailing-address.narrative: PO box 30919, 2500 GX The Hague, The Netherlands

sector.narrative: The right to social and political participation
